sentences.en: As a rule, we do not accept payment by installment.
sentences.cn: 一般来说我们不接受分期付款方式.

sentences.en: Buying goods on the installment plan has become epidemic in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来,用分期付款的办法购物十分流行.

sentences.en: Do you have an installment plan available for your customers?
sentences.cn: 你们这里有分期付款业务 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every time I pay back an installment I did it on time.
sentences.cn: 我每次的还款也是相当的准时的.

sentences.en: Factoring in connection with automobile installment accounts is a big business today.
sentences.cn: 代管汽车分期付款的到期帐目是当今一桩巨大的业务.

sentences.en: Five of this went to pay the regular installment on the clothes she had to buy.
sentences.cn: 其中的5块钱被用来付她非买不可的行头的分期付款.

sentences.en: He likes to buy things on the installment plan.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢用分期付款法购买货物.

sentences.en: He pays $ 50 down and the rest in monthly installment.
sentences.cn: 他先付了50美元定金,其余的按每月份期付款.

sentences.en: His car was repossessed because of default of monthly installment.
sentences.cn: 因为拖欠按月应付的分期付款,他的汽车被收回了.

sentences.en: I shall soon pay the last installment of my debt.
sentences.cn: 不久我将偿付我的最后一期债款.

sentences.en: I will cover these transitions in the next installment.
sentences.cn: 我将在接下来的部分中讨论这些转移。

sentences.en: In such contrast the heath was the appearance of an installment of night.
sentences.cn: 相形之下,荒原已经有几分夜色.

sentences.en: In this installment of Mission:Messaging, I will walk you through the tasks to configure basic SSL channels with self-signed certificates, building two scripts as we go.
sentences.cn: 在《任务：消息传递》系列的这个部分，我将和您一起完成使用自签名证书配置基本 SSL 通道的任务，我们将构建两个脚本。

sentences.en: Now she can reduce the installment size that she can afford to pay, by extending the loan period.
sentences.cn: 现在，她就可通过展延贷款周期来减小自己有能力支付的分期付款的规模。

sentences.en: The last installment will be split into two movies.
sentences.cn: 故事的最后一部分将会拍成两部电影。

sentences.en: The photography trip was the latest installment in a continuing series.
sentences.cn: 这趟摄影之旅是个持续系列的最新装置品.

sentences.en: We built an model for periodic multi - installment algorithm by linear programming.
sentences.cn: 利用线性规划得到了周期性的多趟调度算法的数学模型.

sentences.en: We will also discuss this in more detail in an upcoming installment.
sentences.cn: 我们将在后续的部分中更详细地讨论这个问题。

sentences.en: Yes, savings, checking, loan and installment credit accounts, too.
sentences.cn: 是的, 储蓄 、 支票 、 贷款和分期还款账户也保存在计算机中.
